abstract: Metropolitan Transit Authority officials say transit worker Louis Gray was struck and killed by subway train in Brooklyn while he was working on tracks; another worker, Jeffry Fleming, was injured in same accident, and is listed in stable condition.

headline.print_headline: Transit Worker Is Killed by a Subway Train in Brooklyn
headline.main: Transit Worker Fatally Struck by Subway Train in Brooklyn

snippet: Three workers were on the tracks near the Fort Hamilton Parkway station to set up a work zone when a G train hit two of the workers around 12:05 a.m., transit officials said....
lead_paragraph: Three workers were on the tracks near the Fort Hamilton Parkway station to set up a work zone when a G train hit two of the workers around 12:05 a.m., transit officials said.
